title: 2140labs
author: 2140labs
content: Hashbranch is a B2B marketplace focused on helping bitcoin miners find quality hosting for their ASICs. Founded by miners turned our own struggles into a thriving opportunity, creating the most trusted and popular platform for Bitcoin miner hosting.https://hashbranch.comHashbranch offers a transparent, trustworthy marketplace where quality meets reliability:- Over 1GW of energized capacity listed- Transparent pricing and real-time availability – a first in the industry!- A new bidding system aligns our supply with demand seamlessly- Live uptime data from our Premium Hosts – because seeing is believing- Verified reviews from real miners – no more guesswork
